analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BoostContainer.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#319-337):
	External calls:
	- withdrawAmount = getWithdrawValue(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#325-328)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- mapCompletionNumberForWithdraw (/unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#330-332)
SafeMathForBoost.assert (function @ /unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#49-57) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Boost.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#211) shadows:
	- Boost.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#244-250)

BoostContainer.getWithdrawValue has external calls inside a loop:
	- tokenAmount = boost.balanceOfAt(_address,blockNumber) (/unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#369-372)

BoostContainer.getWithdrawValue has external calls inside a loop:
	- withdrawAmount = withdrawAmount.add(tokenAmount.mul(depositedEther).div(boost.totalSupply())) (/unique_contracts/0xbdb686ac471b374bdc844615c768c2595c2ff2fe.sol#373-378)
